column7: and Mollāvarjān) is a city and capital of Falavarjan County
column13: 097 families.The ancient name of this city was Barze which means the branch of a tree or cultivation. This name gradually changed to Varjan. During the Safavid period due to the construction of a bridge on the Zayandeh Rood (river)
column14: Varjan was renamed Polavarjan and thence to Falavarjan. The city is a part of Esfahan metropolitan area.

column2: the city is served by Falavarjan County Municipalities Mass Transit Organization bus network.

column1: Islamic Azad University of FalavarjanIslamic Azad University of Falavarjan has been founded in 1984.
